317616.「３つの地方の調査は 無事終了っ！\n 星のオーラも たーっぷり 手に入ったし\:
We've successfully explored all three regions!
Now that we have plenty of Benevolessence,
I wonder if that shrine door will open now?

317617.「この調子で 創失の呪いを解く方法\n 見つけだそうね。<pc>隊長！:
If we keep this up, we're sure to find a way
to break the curse of unmaking!

317618.「よう。お前たち もう戻ってたのか。: Yo. You guys were already here?

317620.「やあ 君たち。\n メネト村の調査では 世話になったね。\n ドゥラ院長は 中:
Hi there. Thanks again for your help over in
Menet Village. Say, is Dura inside?

317622.「あーっ エッちゃんと ナブおじさんだ！！: Ahh! It's Estie and Mr. Nab!

317624.「ちぇーっ。モフり失敗かぁ……。\n 調査の疲れを プク毛の モフモフで\n い:
Aw, man... I couldn't rub your fluffy Puku
fur... I wanted to relieve some of my stress,
too...

317625.「やれやれ。そんなに ショボくれんなよ。\n ポルテの嬢ちゃんよ。: Oh, dear. Don't look so down, my dear Porte.

317627.「な…なんて うらやましい……！\n 私だって あの フカフカの毛並みを\n モ:
I...I'm so jealous... I want to feel that
soft and fluffy fur, too...!

317628.「……ゴホン。なんでもありません。\n 私たちも ただいま 帰還いたしました。: Ahem... Never mind. We've returned as well.

317629.「なにやら 外が にぎやかだと思えば……\n 皆さん お戻りのようですね。:
There's quite a bit of noise out here...
It appears everyone's returned.

317630.「おや。南の地の調査へ向かった\n メレアーデ王女と ジーガンフ殿は？: Oh? Where is Princess Mereade and Jiganf?

317632.「ジーくんは アマラークの住民たちに\n フーラズーラとの戦い方を 教えるため\:
Jee chose to stay behind in Amarak, so he
could teach its citizens how to fight off
the Hula Zula.

317633.「では……これで 全員ですね。\n ゼニアス 南 北 東の 調査結果を\n お聞:
Then...that's everyone. Please tell me your
findings of the regions of Zeniath you
explored.

317634.<pc>たち 調査隊員は\n果ての大地ゼニアス ３地方の調査結果を\nドゥラ院長:
<pc> and co. reported their findings
about the three regions of Zeniath
that they had explored!

317635.「ふむ……。ゼニアス各地の住人たちは\n それぞれに 問題を抱えていたようですね:
Hmm... I suppose that the inhabitants of
Zeniath from all around had their share of
problems.

317636.「そして 女神ゼネシアが 言うとおり\n 人々を助けると その星封の結晶に\n:
And when you helped those people just as the
Goddess Zenethia said, the Benevogem was
filled with Benevolessence...

317637.「うん！ 町の人たちを 助けると\n <pc>隊長が持つ 星封の結晶が\n 青く:
Yeah! Whenever <pc> helped people,
the gem would turn blue!

317638.「すごく あったかくて きれいだったよ。\n 星のオーラって みんなの感謝の心か:
It was so warm and beautiful. I wonder if
Benevolessence comes from people's gratitude?

317639.「少なくとも <pc>と ポルテが会った\n 例の 女神ゼネシアってヤツは\n:
From what <pc> and Porte encountered
at least, it seems like that goddess was
tellin' the truth.

317642.「ラキは 見ていた。\n おまえたちが 星のオーラを 手に入れるのを。:
Raki watched. Watched you obtain
Benevolessence.

317643.「……峠のほこらへ 来るといい。\n ゼネシアねえさまが\n おまえたちを 待っ:
Come to the Mountain Pass Shrine.
My sister Zenethia is waiting for you
there.

317644.「待って ラキ！\n 峠のほこらへ行くなら 私たちと一緒に……:
Wait, Raki! If you're headed there, let us go
with you...

317645.「ゼニアス西部の 調査担当は <pc>と\n ポルテの嬢ちゃんだったはずだが\n:
It was supposed to be just <pc> and
Porte checking out the western region,
but I guess Mereade's joining them now?

317646.「……そのようですね。\n <pc>隊長。ふたりのことを 頼みます。:
...it seems that way, yes.
<pc>. I'm counting on you both.

317647.「まあ <pc>が ついてりゃ\n 心配はないと思うが\n しっかりやれよ ポル:
Well, as long as <pc>'s with you,
you don't got much to worry about.
Just do your best, Porte.

317648.「西部は 禁足地とのこと……。\n 何が 待ち受けているか わかりません。\n:
The western region is a forbidden area...
There's no telling what could be waiting
there. Please be careful.

317649.「何かあったら すぐに 知らせてくれ。\n 僕たちが チカラになるよ。:
If there's anything you need, don't hesitate
to ask. We all have your back.

317650.「よぉーし <pc>隊長～！\n 峠のほこらに ゴーゴー！:
Alrighty, <pc>!
Let's go to the Mountain Pass Shrine!

317651.「おっかしいな～？\n なんで 開かないんだろ……。: That's weird... I wonder why it won't open...

317652.「……無駄だ。\n その扉は チカラでは 開かない。:
...it's pointless. The door cannot be opened
by mere force.

317653.「むむむ～っ！\n じゃあ 開け方 教えてってばー！: Grrrr! Tell me how to open it, then!

317656.「ふふっ。遠方より来たりし 客人と\n すっかり 仲良くなったのですね……。\n:
Hmm hmm... It appears you've become quite
acquainted with our guests from afar.
I'm pleased to see that.

317657.「前から 不思議な子だとは 思ってたけど\n 女神さまの 弟だったなんて……！:
You always came off as mysterious, but I
never would've guessed your sister was a
goddess!

317658.「ねえさま。この者たちは\n 星のオーラを 手に入れてくれました。\n ……今な:
Sister... They were able to obtain
Benevolessence. ...surely, it must be!

317659.「ええ……。必ずや 成しとげてくださると\n 信じていました <pc>……。:
Yes... I believed that you would
surely accomplish this task, <pc>...

317660.「彼方なる世界より 来たりし 誓約の子らよ。\n どうか そのチカラを お貸しく:
Children of the Covenant, who have come from a
distant world... Please lend us your strength.

317661.「ねえさまを 封印から解き放ってほしい。\n ……おまえたちにしか できないこと:
Please release my sister from her seal.
Only you are capable...

317663.「今 あなたがたと 言葉を交わしている\n この姿は かりそめのもの……。:
The form you see before you simply a
projection...

317664.「本当のわたくしは この扉の向こう……\n 禁足地と 呼ばれる地にて\n 長き眠:
My true body lies beyond this door, in a place
called the Forbidden Lands... It is there
that I have been kept in a long slumber.

317665.「ええっと～。\n 前に ゼネシアさまが言ってた\n いにしえの戦い…ってやつの:
Umm...is it because of that ancient battle
that you mentioned to us before...?

317666.「……まこと 恐ろしき災いでした。\n 我が父も あの戦いで……。:
Truly, it was a terrifying disaster...
My father, too, was involved in that battle...

317667.「神なき世界が いかなる有様になるかは\n ゼニアスを旅した あなたがたが\n:
As you made your travels throughout Zenithia,
you have no doubt seen the state of a
world without gods...

317668.「誓約の子らの もたらす 光にて\n 目覚めることができた 今こそ\n わたくし:
Now, awakened by the light of the Children
of the Convenant...I wish to save this world.

317669.「さあ <pc>……。\n あなたがたに授けた\n 星封の結晶を この扉へ……。:
Come, <pc>...
Offer the Benevogem unto this door...

317671.「ああ……懐かしき 星のオーラの輝き。\n どれほど この時を 待ちわびたことか:
Oh...that nostalgic glow of Benevolessence...
How long I have waited for this moment...?

317672.「……時は 来たれり！\n 扉に 星封の結晶を かざし\n ゼニアスに 光を も:
The time is now! Hold the Benevogem up to
the door, and bring light to all of Zeniath!

317675.「なんて 神々しい……。\n あの方が この世界の女神 ゼネシア様なのね。:
How divine... She must be the goddess of this
world.

317676.「ねえ ラキ。\n 大樹の鳥籠まで 道案内を 頼めないかしら？:
Say, Raki. Can you tell us how to get to The
Tree's Cage?

317677.「むりだ。封印の地 大樹の鳥籠には\n 絶対に 近づくなと ラキは\n とうさま:
It's impossible. Raki is under strict orders
from his father to stay away from that place.

317680.「とにかく 次の目標は\n その 大樹の鳥籠という場所のようね。\n まずは 扉:
Well, it looks like the next place we should
go is this Tree's Cage place. Let's make our
way through the door.

317681.「……木は 生えてるけど\n 大樹の鳥籠って カンジじゃないねー。\n ここじゃ:
There's trees growing here, but I don't this
is The Tree's Cage... Maybe it's not here?

317682.「人が 住んでいた形跡は あるけれど……: There are signs of people living here, but...

317683.「いたいたっ！\n <pc>隊長 あの子たちに\n 道を 聞いてみようよ！:
Over there! <pc>, let's go ask those
kids for some directions!

317685.「おいで……。一緒に 遊ぼ？:
Here, birdie birdie... Will you play with
me?

317690.「えっ……！\n 誰なの アンタたち……。\n まさか……町の外から 来たの？:
Huh? Who are you...? Did you...
come from the outside?

317691.「わあっ。星封の結晶が 光ったよ！\n 女神さまの お導きだねっ。\n <pc>:
Oh! The Benevogem's shining! It's probably
the goddess' guidance!

317692.「ええ。この門の 向こうに\n 大樹の鳥籠があるに 違いないわ。\n さっそく:
Yes, The Tree's Cage must be just beyond this
gate! Let's hurry!

317694.「町の外に出ちゃ 危ないよ。\n あの オオカミが どこかで 見張ってる。\n:
You shouldn't go outside. That scary wolf is
watching. He might get you!

317695.「この町に 子供は アタシたちだけ。\n お父さんと お母さん おじいちゃんと\:
We're the only kids in this town. There's no
one else here 'cept our dad, mom, and
grandpa.

317696.「だから アタシたち ずっと\n 古い物語の本に出てくる 外の世界に\n あこが:
That's why we always wanted to know what
the world of the outside was like, just like
the old storybooks told...

317697.「お願い！ ずっと この町にいて！\n 町の中にいれば オオカミは 襲ってこない:
Please! You gotta stay here! The bad wolf
won't hurt you if you stay. Please tell us
what it's like outside!

317698.「<pc>隊長ォ～ メレち～。\n この子たち どうしよっか……。:
<pc>... Merry...
What are we gonna do about these kids...?

317699.「……ごめんなさい ふたりとも。\n 私たち とても 大事な用があるから\n ど:
Sorry, you two... But we have to leave
because there's something really important
we have to do.

317700.「でも 心配はいらないわ。\n <pc>は 世界中の誰よりも強くて\n 頼りにな:
But don't worry, okay? <pc> is
stronger and more reliable than anyone in the
whole world. Even wolves don't scare <if_woman>her<else>him<endif>!

317701.「じゃあ……メレちー。\n アタシも 連れてってくれる？: Then, Merry... Can I go with you?

317702.「ダメだよ デニッサ！\n おじいちゃん 足が悪いから アタシたちが\n マキを:
No way, Denissa! Grandpa can't walk well, so
we gotta break the firewood and bring him
food!

317703.「……それに お母さんも お父さんも\n さみしがり屋だよ。アンタがいなくなった:
And mom and dad are so lonely... If you went
away, they'd cry every day...

317704.「……そうだよね。ごめんね ロイザ。\n アタシ いかない。\n メレちー。また:
...yeah, I got it. Sorry, Loiza. I won't go.
Please come and see us again, Merry...

317705.「いいのよ 気にしないで。\n 約束するわ。大事な用事が 終わったら\n 必ず:
Don't worry about it. I promise that once I
finish my important mission, I'll definitely
come back.

317707.メレアーデは デニッサから\n守護天使のお守りを もらった！:
Mereade received a Guardian Angel Amulet from
Denissa!

317708.「きれいな細工ね……。\n あなたの 宝物じゃないの？:
It's beautifully made... Isn't this your
treasure?

317709.「すごーく昔に おじいちゃんが くれたの。\n 町の 守護天使さまのチカラが宿っ:
My grandpa gave it to me a reaaally long time
ago. It's an amulet that's got the power of
this town's guardian angel.

317710.「聖なるチカラで 悪いヤツから\n 守ってくれるんだって。\n あの オオカミに:
They said it's got a sacred power to protect
us from the bad guys. Maybe it'll work on
that mean wolf too!

317711.「……ありがとう！\n それじゃ 少しの間だけ貸してもらうわね。\n 絶対 無事:
Thank you! I'll borrow it for a while. I'll
be sure to come back safely and return
it.

317712.「へへっ。ほんと メレちーって\n いいお姉ちゃんって カンジだよね～。:
Hehe... Merry, you really give off those
big sister vibes!

317713.「……ええ そうかもね。\n さあ 出発しましょう <pc>。\n 北にあるとい:
...I suppose I do. Okay, let's get going.
We have to head north to get to The
Tree's Cage.

317716.<center>……誓約の子らよ……。\nどう…か……\nわたくしを ここ…から:
Children of the Covenant...
Please... Release me from
here...!

317717.「ずいぶん 苦しそう……。\n 早く 封印から 解き放ってあげなきゃ。:
She seems in a lot of pain... We have to break
that seal.

317718.「むむむむぅ～。でも あんな高いとこじゃ\n どうしようもないよ……。:
Grrrr... But there's nothing we can do when
she's so high up...

317719.「ヒ ヒヒヒ……。\n 悪いんだぁ 悪いんだぁ……。\n ここは ヒミツの 場所:
Hee hee hee heeeee....
Sorry, soooo sorry...but this is a secret
place.

317720.「だぁれも 来ちゃ いけない場所に\n こぉーっそり 忍びこむ 悪い子には……:
Bad little children who sneak into places
they're not supposed to will be in lots of
trouble...

317722.「ど どうして オイラが 負けるんだぁ……？\n ヒヒ ヒヒヒヒ……ッ。:
H..How...could I lose...? ME...?
Hee, hee... Hee hee hee heeeeee....

317723.「……なぁーんだぁ オマエたち\n 誓約の子…だったのかぁ……。:
Oh, my... So you are the Children of the
Covenant... I seeee...

317725.「誓約の子……だっけ？\n 女神さまにも そう 呼ばれたけど\n どういう意味な:
Children of the Covenant...? The goddess
called us the same thing, but what does
it mean exactly?

317726.<center>ああ <cs_pchero>……！\n幻では ないのですね。\n:
Oh, <cs_pchero>...!
It's no illusion, truly...?
You've finally come...

317727.<center>こんなにも 晴れやかな気持ちに なれたのは\n久方ぶりです……。:
It's been so long since I've felt even a
shred of hope...

317728.<center>さあ 星封の結晶を……。\n星のオーラを ささげてくださいませ…:
Please, your Benevogem...
Offer to me your Benevolessence!

317729.<cs_pchero>は 星封の結晶に集めた\n星のオーラを ささげた！:
<cs_pchero> offers the Benevolessence
they collected in the Benevogem!

317730.「……何万年もの間\n この時を 待ちわびていました。:
...I have waited for this moment for tens of
thousands of years.

317731.「わたくしを 解き放ってくださったこと……\n 心より 感謝します <cs_pc:
Words alone cannot express my gratitude for
your releasing me, <cs_pchero>...

317733.「ありがとう 優しい方。\n あなたは……。おふたりの 仲間でしたね？:
Thank you, kind one. You are...a companion of
those two?

317734.「あっ この人は メレちーです！\n あたしと <cs_pchero>隊長と 一:
Yes, this girl's name is Merry! She's a
princess who's part of our exploration
team!

317735.「まあ……！ メレちー……ですか？\n 少々 風変わりですが\n とっても素敵な:
My! Merry...was it? A bit peculiar, but..
it's a very nice name.

317736.「そのっ 今のは ポルテちゃんが つけてくれた\n 私の愛称で……！\n 本当の:
Well, that's just a nickname Porte gave to me!
My real name is Mereade.

317739.「わたくしは ネーしゃま……ですか？\n ふふっ いい響き……。:
I'm...Zenny? Hehe... It has a nice ring to
it...

317740.「かわいらしい お名前を ありがとう。\n ……ポルテ。: Thank you for such a lovely name, Porte...

317741.「さすが 女神様は 心が広いわね……。:
Always count on a goddess to have a heart of
gold...

317742.「さあ ゼニアスに生きる すべての者のため\n この鳥籠を 後にしましょう……:
Now, for the sake of all those living in
Zeniath, let us leave this cage...

317744.「……あら？\n 私たち 部屋の中に いたはずなのに。: ...huh? Weren't we just inside that room?

317745.「バビューン！ って飛ぶの 気持ちいい～！\n ありがとう ネーしゃまっ！:
Weeheeee! It feels so good to fly!
Thanks, Zenny!

317746.「大地に満ちる この気配……\n 数万年の眠りを経ても 世界を蝕む呪いは\n い:
The presence that fills the land... Even after a slumber over tens of thousands of years, the curse that eats away at this world
still yet lingers...

317748.「あなたがたの世界に 広まりつつある\n かの 災いの源こそが\n 果ての大地ゼ:
The very source of the curse in your world is
the same one that gnaws away at Zeniath...

317749.「……創失の呪いが 消えぬかぎり\n ゼニアスも あなたがたの世界も\n 決して:
As long as the curse of unmaking remains,
neither Zeniath nor your world will know
salvation...

317750.「これは 誓約の子である あなたがたにしか\n できぬこと。ゼニアスに満ちる 創:
Only you, the Children of the Covenant,
can sever the curse that plagues this
world...!

317751.「聖湖ゼニートより 川沿いに さかのぼり\n 西の ウォルドの聖簾を 目指すので:
From Zenit, follow the river upstream to
Angelfall, in the west.

317753.「ゼニアスを 守護する神として\n 長き眠りの果てに この世界が いかなる姿と\:
As Zeniath's guardian goddess, I must know
the state of the world after my long slumber.

317754.「我が民と 大地の 現状を確かめたなら\n すぐに わたくしも\n ウォルドの聖:
As soon I see with my own eyes what's happened
to this land and its people, then I will come
to Angelfall.

317755.「<cs_pchero> メレちー ポルテ……。\n また のちほど……:
<cs_pchero>, Merry, Porte...
I will see you soon...

317756.「ウォルドの聖簾って 遠いのかなー。\n もう あたし へとへとだよ～。:
I hope Angelfall isn't too far away...
I'm already exhausted...

317757.「<cs_pchero>隊長！\n 今日は 疲れたから 聖湖ゼニートで休んで\n:
<cs_pchero>! I'm beat for today.
Let's go back to Zenit to rest, and we'll
leave tomorrow!

317758.「そういえば デニッサと ロイザに\n 外の世界の話を してあげる約束だったわね:
I also promised that we'd tell Denissa and
Loiza about the outside world.

317759.「みんな！ お腹すいたでしょ。\n ごちそう 作ってきてあげたよっ！:
Hey, you guys! You must be hungry.
I made some yummy food!

317760.「わぁっ おいしそう……！\n 私たちのために ありがとう。ロイザ！:
Wow, it looks delicious! Thank you for
everything, Loiza!

317761.「ねえ もうひとりの子は どうしたの？\n ほらほら 妹の……\n たしか デニ:
Say, what happened to the other girl?
You know, your sister...
Her name was Denissa, I think?

317763.「アタシは ひとりっ子だよ。\n デニッサなんて人 知らない。:
I'm an only child. I don't know anyone
named Denissa.

317764.「そうよ ポルテちゃん。冗談はやめて。\n この町にいる 子どもは ロイザだけじ:
She's right, Porte. Now's not the time to be
joking. Roiza is the only child here.

317765.「あ あはははは！ そうだったよね。\n ……ところで あたしたちが 出発してか:
Ah...ahahaha! You're right.
By the way, has anything changed since we
were gone?

317766.「えっとね。みんなのことが 気になって\n 北の門に行ったんだ。そしたら あのオ:
Umm, well... I went to the north gate 'cuz I
was worried about you guys. Then that scary
wolf showed up... I got so scared I fainted.

317767.「しばらくして 目が覚めたら\n オオカミは いなくなってたんだけど\n ほんっ:
I woke up a bit later, but the wolf was
already gone. He almost got me.

317768.「ごめんごめん！ 食事が 冷めちゃうよね。\n 町の外の話は あとで聞かせて。\:
Oh, I'm sorry! The food's gonna get cold!
We can talk about the outside world later.
Please enjoy your food!

317769.「……つまり このお守りを くれた子が\n 大樹の鳥籠から 戻ってくるまでの間に:
So you're saying...the girl that gave me this
amulet was unmade before we came back
from The Tree's Cage...

317770.「うん。ロイザと デニッサは 双子の女の子。\n 最初に 町に着いたとき メレち:
Yeah. Loiza and Denissa are twins. When we
first got here, you protected Denissa from
that wolf.

317771.「わからない……。\n 私の記憶に そんな女の子は いないの。\n でも あなた:
I don't know... I don't remember any girl
like that. But I don't think you two are lying
to me.

317772.「……ごめんなさい デニッサ。\n あなたのこと 忘れてしまって……。:
I'm sorry, Denissa...
I forgot all about you...

317773.「それにしても 不思議ね……。\n どうして <pc>と ポルテちゃんだけが\n:
I still wonder, though... How come only you
and <pc> can remember people who
are unmade?

317774.「う～ん……。なんでだろうね？\n メレちーや ロイザのほうが\n デニッサとは:
Hmmm... I do wonder that, too...
You and Loiza were supposed to be close
with Denissa...

317775.「なんにせよ 例の狼が\n 創失の呪いに 関わっている可能性が高そうね。:
At any rate, I'm betting that the wolf is
behind the curse of unmaking.

317776.「でもさ メレちー。\n あんなヤツ アストルティアに いなかったよ？\n 同じ:
But hey, Merry... It wasn't in Astoltia,
right? If it's the same curse, shouldn't it
have come from the same thing?

317777.「……確かに そうよね。\n はぁ～っ！ わからないことだらけで\n 頭が 痛く:
...of course, you're right. Aahhh...
My head hurts trying to understand all
this!

317778.「とにかく 明日は ネーしゃまが言ってた\n ウォルドの聖簾ってとこに 行ってみ:
Anyway, tomorrow we'll head for Angelfall.
Then we'll know what the source of the
curse is!

317779.「そうね……。\n がんばりましょう ポルテちゃん。\n <pc>。:
You're right...
Let's do our best, okay?

317780.「よぉーっし！ 腹が減っては いくさはできぬ！\n ……って 言うもんね。\n:
Ooooookay! You know what they say...you can't
do anything on an empty stomach! I'm gonna
eat a lot and sleep like a baby!

317782.<pc> ポルテ メレアーデは\nロイザ手作りの夕食を たいらげ\nゆっくり 眠:
<pc>, Porte, and Mereade eat Loiza's
homecooked meal, and slowly drift off
to sleep...

317784.「すっごく キレイな滝だね～。\n ネーしゃまの話だと\n ここに 呪いの源が:
What a beautiful waterfall...
According to Zenny, this is where the
source of the curse is...

317785.「ウォルドの聖簾は 聖なる地……。\n 立ち入ることは ゆるさない。:
Angelfall is a sacred place...
A place that you cannot enter.

317786.「……去れ。\n 二度と この滝に 近づくな。:
...leave. Never come near this waterfall
again.

317787.「ラキ……？\n どうしたの そんなに怖い顔をして……。:
Raki...?
What's wrong? You look frightened...

317788.「ラキは ふつうだ。\n ……早く 立ち去るといい。:
Raki is fine.
...you should leave here, now.

317789.「女神ゼネシア様は 呪いの源が\n ここにあると 言っていたわ。\n 呪いを断た:
Zenethia said the source of the curse is
here. If we don't break the curse, then we
can't save this world...

317790.「ラキ。あなたは アマラークの民を\n 助けようとしていた……。\n ゼニアスを:
Raki, you were trying to help the people of
Amarak... You love Zeniath, don't you?

317791.「どんな事情があるかは 知らないけれど\n お願い……どうか 邪魔をしないで。\:
I don't know your reasons, but please...
Please don't stop us. We want to save
this world!

317792.「たとえ ねえさまの 言いつけでも\n ……ここだけは 絶対に だめだ！:
Even if she ordered you to...
...you still cannot come here!

317794.「……しかたない。\n ラキは 役目を 果たすだけ！:
...It cannot be helped. Raki is only doing
his duty!

317796.「……これ以上 乱暴はしたくないの。\n ラキ お願いよ。ここを通して。:
I don't want to fight you anymore.
Please, Raki. Please let us through.

317797.「ラキは……\n 命にかえても 役目を 果たす！:
Raki...does his part, even if it means
death!

317801.「<cs_pchero>たちは わたくしを\n 封印から 解き放ってくれた 恩人:
These people are the ones who freed me from
my seal... I will not allow you to hurt them.

317802.「でも！ ラキは とうさまを 守る！\n とうさまの 言いつけだ！:
But! Raki protects his father!
That is what father ordered!

317803.「……ラキ。あなたは 父の守護者であると同時に\n 果ての大地ゼニアスの 守護者:
Raki...not only are you the protector of your
father, but of the whole of Zeniath as well.
You mustn't lose sight of what's important.

317804.「創失の呪いは 悪しき者どもを 退けた！\n もう 何万年か 待っていれば\n:
The curse of unmaking has driven out those who are wicked! By waiting another hundred thousand of years, the curse will fade, and
Zeniath at peace!

317805.「その間 数え切れぬほどの命が\n 創失の呪いにより 失われていくのを\n あな:
And while we wait, countless lives will be
taken by the curse! Are you going to just
wait idly by and let that happen?!

317806.「……長き まどろみの中で わたくしは\n はかなき望みを 抱いておりました。:
In my long slumber, I had harbored a fleeting
hope...

317807.「永劫にも思える まどろみの間に 創失の呪いは\n この地より 消え果てるはず…:
In my seemingly eternal slumber, the curse of
unmaking should fade from this land...that
is what my father promised before I slept.

317808.「けれど 父の願いも むなしく\n 創失の呪いは いまだ消えず……\n 異世界ア:
However, my father's wish remains unfulfilled, and the curse of unmaking still remains...and it extends its reach even to
the distant world of Astoltia.

317809.「ラキ。もはや 我々だけの問題ではないのです。\n ゼニアスと アストルティア。:
Raki...this is no longer our problem alone.
For the sake of both Zeniath and Astoltia,
we must stop the curse at its source...

317810.「ラキは ゆるさない！！\n みんなみんな この地より 去れっ！:
Raki will never forgive you!
Everyone must leave this place!

317813.「しばらく そこで\n 頭を 冷やしていなさい……！: Take this time to calm yourself down...!

317815.「……心配は いりません。\n あの子が 落ち着いたら\n すぐに 出してあげま:
Worry not. I will release him as soon as he
calms down... So I...

317821.「この場所に 創失の呪いの源が……？\n 奥へ進んでみましょう <cs_pche:
So this is the place that is the source of the
curse...? Let's head inside.

317823.「それにしても 不気味な部屋ね……。\n 創失の呪いの源は どこなのかしら？:
What a creepy room this is...
Where is it the source of the curse comes
from?

317825.「なんて巨大な 人間……なの？\n ……それに この霧は。: Is a huge...human? And this mist...

317827.「消えちゃった！？\n ねえ……。創失の呪いの源って……:
It's gone?! Hey... The source of the curse of
unmaking... It's...

317828.「あいつっ！\n 聖湖ゼニートに現れた 狼だよ！: Look! It's the wolf that showed up in Zenit!

317829.「主の眠りを さまたげることは\n 絶対に ゆるさない……！:
No one shall be allowed to disturb the
master's slumber...!

317831.「話はあとよ <cs_pchero>！\n 今は あの狼を 止めましょう！:
We'll talk later, <cs_pchero>!
For now, we have to stop that wolf!

317832.「やっぱり あなただったのね。\n ラキ……どうして こんなことを？:
Raki, I knew it was you...
Why have you done this?

317833.「とうさまの 眠りを さまたげる者は\n ゆるさない……！\n おまえたちには:
No one shall disturb the master's slumber...!
You will not lay a single finger on him!

317834.「ラキは……とうさまを 守る。\n たとえ この命に かえてもっ……！:
Raki...will protect him. Even if it means
death...!

317836.「私は あの男の子を 助けなきゃ……。\n でも……あの子の名前が 思いだせない:
I have to save that boy...
But...that boy...I don't remember his name...
Who...is that boy...?

317837.「いけない ラキ！\n お父様から 離れるのです！:
Don't, Raki!
You must stay away from Father!

317838.「あ…あれは……\n あの子は ラキよ！\n どうして……私 忘れていたのっ！？:
Ah...Huh...?
That boy is Raki! How...how did I forget
that?!

317839.「神なる身をもってしても 逃れられぬ呪いは\n 今なお お父様の身体より わきい:
The curse, one which even the gods cannot
escape, continues to emanate from Father's
body...and threatens to destroy this world.

317840.「……自分ひとり 残して\n 世界のすべてが消え去ることを\n どうして お父様:
Why would Father wish the entire world to
disappear, leaving only himself behind...?

317841.「誓約の子たる あなたがたならば\n 呪いの源を 断つことも できるやもと\n:
Children of the Covenant... I led you here
under the impression that you would be
able to break the curse at its source...

317842.「創失の呪いの前には ラキすら この有様。\n 人たる身に 太刀打ちできるはずも:
Even Raki was like this before the curse of unmaking existed. There is no way for mere mortals to contend with it... We have no
choice but to find another way.

317843.「待って ラキ！\n まだ 無理をしちゃ ダメよ！！:
Wait, Raki! You mustn't push yourself any
longer!

317844.「あの子が ご迷惑を おかけしましたね……。\n ラキは 世界の創造主たる 我が:
Raki is the divine beast of my father...the
creator of this world.

317845.「主に 忠義を尽くすあまり\n その言いつけを 絶対と 思い込んでいるだけで\n:
He simply believes in his duty so firmly due
to his unwavering loyalty. He is not a
bad child at heart...

317846.「……この 地底に眠る巨人こそが\n 創失の呪いの源……\n そして 我らが父な:
The giant sleeping in the depths of the land
is the source of the curse of unmaking...
...and our Great Father. Gran Zenith.

317847.「我が父の生みだせし 創失の呪いこそが\n ゼニアスと アストルティアを蝕む\n:
The curse of unmaking created by my father...
it is indeed the source of the plague that
corrupts both Zeniath and Astoltia.

317848.「父は この地底に 自らを封じ込めることで\n 何万年もかけて 呪いを 鎮めよう:
For tens of thousands of years, my father attempted to contain the curse by sealing himself deep within the ground...
...unsuccessfully, it seems.

317849.「あ あの……！ 今の神様の名前って\n アストルティアの 人間の神と 同じでは:
W-wait...! The name of that god is the same as
the human god in Astoltia...!

317850.「あなたがたの世界のことは 存じませんが\n この世界 ゼニアスにおける\n グ:
I know not about your world, but in this
world of Zeniath, Gran Zenith is the Creator
of All Things.

317851.「我が父にして 我ら すべての父\n 一なる神 主神グランゼニスによって\n ゼ:
Our father, the father of all, and the one
true god Gran Zenith... He is the one who
created Zeniath.

317852.「……そして わたくし ゼネシアと\n 妹のルティアナは\n 主神グランゼニスの:
And I Zenethia, along with my sister Lutiana,
are daughters of Gran Zenith...

317853.「女神…ルティアナ……！？\n それって しばらく前に 亡くなられた\n アスト:
Did you say...Lutiana...?! That must be the
Goddess of Creation who passed away some
time ago!

317855.「そう…ですか……。\n わたくしが 長き眠りについている間に\n ……妹は も:
I...I see... While I was in my endless
slumber, my sister had already...

317856.「気が遠くなるほど 昔……: So long ago that it feels unfathomable...

317857.「果ての大地ゼニアスを\n ジア・クト念晶体という\n 恐ろしい生命体が 襲いま:
Zeniath was attacked by terrifying lifeforms
who called themselves the Dia Kut
Telecrystal...

317858.「激しい戦いの末 敗北を予感した お父様は\n か弱き妹 ルティアナと この世界:
After a fierce battle, my Father sensed defeat... So, he allowed my frail sister Lutiana and the beings of this world to
escape from Zeniath.

317859.「ルティアナを 送り出した後\n わたくしは 父を助け ジア・クトと\n 戦いま:
After Lutiana was sent away, I tried to help
my father in defeating the Dia Kut. But our
power was not enough, and we had lost...

317860.「父は ジア・クトから わたくしを守るため\n この身を 大樹の鳥籠に封じ\n:
My father sealed me within The Tree's Cage
to protect me from the Dia Kut...
...it was his last resort.

317862.「呪いに触れたもの すべてを消し去る\n 諸刃のつるぎを振るい 父グランゼニスは:
Gran Zenith wielded a double-edged sword that eradicated anything the curse touched... He used this to attempt and destroy the
Dia Kut...

317863.「ふたつの世界を蝕む 創失の呪いは\n かつて この世界を守らんがため\n 放た:
The curse of unmaking that consumes our two
worlds was once unleashed in order to protect
this one.

317864.「……ジア・クト念晶体は\n 創失の呪いに侵され 逃げ去りましたが\n 呪いは:
The Dia Kut Telecrystal were affected by the curse of unmaking, and fled. However, the curse consumed my father's body and it
did not disappear...

317865.「そのため お父様は この地下神殿深くに\n 己が身を封じ 時が呪いを消し去ると:
For that reason, Father sealed himself deep within this underground temple and entered a long slumber, believing that
the passage of time would erase the curse.

317866.「されど 数万年の時を経ても 呪いは消え去らず\n ……それどころか 逃げ延びた:
But, even after tens of thousands of years... the curse has not disappeared. And yet...even the escaped Dia Kut managed to bring the
curse of unmaking to Astoltia.

317867.「……父は わたくしに こう言いました。\n 妹 ルティアナが帰還せしとき いま:
My father once told me... "When your sister Lutiana returnsm, and if the curse still lingers...you must sever it with your own
being."

317868.「ですが 遠き地にて ルティアナは息絶え\n わたくし ひとりでは 呪いに立ち向:
But Lutiana has died in a faraway land...
I cannot face this curse alone. I no longer
have the means...

317871.「お父様！ お父様っ！？\n わたくしです……ゼネシアは 目覚めました！\n ど:
Father! Father!! It's me, Zenethia...!!
I am awake! Please, let me hear your
words once more!

317873.「父は とうに 呪いに飲み込まれ\n 助けることはできぬと あきらめていましたが:
My father had been long consumed by the curse, resigning himself beyond any and all help... But he recognized the Children of the
Covenant, and he called out to them.

317875.「あなたがたと 目覚めし父が 邂逅を果たせば\n 光明が もたらされるかもしれま:
If you and my awakened father were to meet,
perhaps we might see a ray of hope. I would
bet on that chance...

317876.「誓約の子 <cs_pchero>……。\n いえ ルティアナの子らよ。\n ど:
Child of the Covenant, <cs_pchero>...
No, Children of Lutiana... Please, for
the sake of Zeniath, lend me your power...

317877.「いけない……！\n この神殿は 創失の呪いが 最も強い場所。\n いったん 外:
No...! This temple is where the curse of
unmaking is strongest! We should return
outside for the time being!

317878.「……お父様が眠る 祭壇の間の扉は\n 閉ざしておきました。\n これ以上 創失:
I have closed the door to the altar where
Father sleeps...so that the curse of unmaking
ceases to leak out.

317879.「ここ ウォルドの聖簾も 聖湖ゼニートも\n わたくしが 眠りにつく前は\n 多:
Angelfall and Zenit were both thriving and
full of people before I fell asleep...

317880.「ラキが 創失の呪いから 人々を守るため\n チカラを ふるっていてくれたようで:
Raki had done his best to protect people from
the curse of unmaking...but still, many lives
were lost.

317881.「これ以上 ひとりの命とて 失いたくない。\n それが わたくしの願いです……。:
I do not want to lose even another life.
That is my wish...

317882.「ラキの気配は 神殿内には ありません。\n ……どこか 遠い場所で\n 身を休:
There was no sign of Raki within the temple...
He is most likely resting somewhere far
away.

317883.「ゼニアスの民を 助けてくださったこと……\n そして わたくしに 新たな希望を:
I am grateful to you for helping the people
of Zeniath, and for giving us a new hope...

317884.「父と わたくしは 長き眠りの中で\n ふたたび この世界に 妹ルティアナの子ら:
My father and I both lay in a long slumber,
waiting for the day when Lutiana's children
would return to this world once again.

317885.「……ゆえに この世界ゼニアスは\n とこしえのゆりかご という二つ名で\n 呼:
Hence, the world of Zeniath is known by
another name: the Eternal Cradle.

317886.「か弱き妹が 成長し その子らとともに\n 帰還する頃には 創失の呪いや\n ジ:
By the time my frail sister grew up and returned here with her children, there would be no worry about the curse of
unmaking or the threat of the Dia Kut...

317887.「……父たる主神 グランゼニスは\n そう 考えていたようですが\n まさか ル:
...that is what my father Gran Zenith once
thought. However, I didn't expect that
Lutiana would already be...

317888.「……ええ 感じます。\n あなたがたは 確かに ルティアナの子ら。:
Yes...I can feel it. You are indeed Lutiana's
children.

317891.「そして あの子の 愛らしさは\n ルティアナが創り出したる 新しき命……\n:
...and her love of all things. The new life
that Lutiana had created...it clearly
dwells within you.

317892.「わたくしは ふたつの世界と\n 愛する父とを 救わねばなりません。:
I must save our two worlds and my beloved
father.

317893.「……それこそが 死せる ルティアナが\n あなたがた 誓約の子らに 託した\n:
...that is precisely the last wish bestowed
upon you, the Children of the Covenant,
by the departed Lutiana.

317894.「今は まだ 封印から解き放たれたばかりで\n チカラも戻りきらぬ わたくしです:
I have only just been freed from my seal, and
my strength has not yet returned...but I will
surely find a way to awaken my father.

317895.「その時は どうか\n わたくしに 手を貸してくださいませ。\n ……<cs_p:
And when that time comes, please lend me your
hand, <cs_pchero>.<yesno><close>

317897.「ええ。燈火の調査隊のチカラで\n 主神グランゼニス様を 目覚めさせて\n ふた:
Yes. Let's use the power of the Ember
Explorers to awaken Gran Zenith and save
both our worlds!

317898.「ありがとう……。\n ですが……申し訳…ありません……。\n しばし 休ませて:
Thank you...
However...I apologize... Please allow me
to rest for some time...

317900.「いろんなことが 一度に 起きすぎて\n ……なんだか 夢でも見ていた気分だわ。:
So many things just happened all at once...
It's like it was some kind of dream...

317901.「ネーしゃまが ラキのねえさまな上に\n 女神ルティアナさまの 姉さまだったなん:
Not only was she Raki's sister, but Lutiana's
sister, too! That really surprised me!

317902.「しかも！ ゼニアスが あの伝説の！\n とこしえのゆりかご だったなんてね～。:
What's more... Talk about legendary! Zeniath
is really the Eternal Cradle... The story my
master told me was a bit different, though.

317903.「創失の呪いが ジア・クトから\n 世界を守るためのもの だったこと……\n 呪:
That the curse of unmaking was meant to
protect the world from the Dia Kut...and
that the source was this world's creator...

317904.「何もかも 今すぐには\n 飲み込めそうに ないけれど……。\n 私たちで でき:
I'm still trying to process it all, but...
We have to do what we can.

317905.「まずは はじまりの地に戻って\n 調査隊のみんなに 報告しましょう！\n <c:
First, we should head back to the Land of
Beginnings and report back to everyone!

317906.「すべての はじまりたる場所\n ……果ての大地 ゼニアス。:
The place where it all began...
Zeniath, the Land's End.

317907.「いにしえの神々が交わせし 誓約は\n アストルティアに 新たなる種を 蒔く……:
The covenant forged with the ancient gods
will sow new seeds within Astoltia...

317908.「芽吹くは 花か それとも……: Will it be flowers that blossom, or...

317909.<cs_pchero>たちは\nはじまりの地へ 戻った……。:
<cs_pchero> and co. return to the
Land of Beginnings...

318124.「……わたくしは 少し 休んでから\n すぐに あなたがたを 追いかけます。:
...I will rest a for a while. Once I regain my
strength, I will join you again.

319050.「あなたにとって大切な場所なのは わかったわ。\n 呪いの源を断つまでだけでいい:
I understand how important this place is to
you. Just until we break the curse... Please,
you have to help us...

321807.<center>ほこらを抜けた先は 禁足地 ウォルド地方。\nその北にある 大樹:
Once you pass through the most sacred site of the Angelfall Region, you will find The Tree's Cage to the north. That is where I am
confined.

321808.<center>星封の結晶が 導いてくれるでしょう。\nあなたがただけが ゼニア:
The Benevogem will guide your way. Only you
are the hope of Zeniath... For the sake of all
people of this land... Please...

321809.<center>お行きなさい <cs_pchero>\nゼニスの封宮へ……！:
You must go, <cs_pchero>...
To the Palace of Zenith...!

321810.<center>ルティアナの子らよ……\nよくぞ ゼニアスへ 帰り来た……。:
Children of Lutiana...
You have done well to return to Zeniath...

321811.<center>お前たちに……伝えねば ならぬ。\n……誓約を 果たすのだ\nふ:
I must tell...you all...
Fulfill the covenant...with the two
lights...of the world...

322019.<center>とこしえのゆりかごで 生まれた厄災は\nやがて この世界にも手を:
The calamity born in the Eternal Cradle will
eventually reach this world. It will destroy
everything in its path...

322020.<center>お父様…目覚めさせる方法……つきとめたら\n……すぐに……呼びか:
When I find a way...to awaken Father...
I will call upon you... We will...meet
again soon...

323288.「聖湖ゼニートの南にある 空き家なら\n 自由に使っていいって 言ってたわ。\n:
They said the vacant house on the south side
of town was free for us to use.
Let's head back, shall we?

323289.「<cs_pchero>隊長～っ！\n ネーしゃまが こんなに 言ってるんだよ。:
<cs_pchero>!!! Zenny is saying so
much right now. We have no choice
but to help her!

323290.「私からも お願い <cs_pchero>！\n 創失の呪いを解く方法を 見つけ:
I'm asking you too, <cs_pchero>!
We have to awaken Gran Zenith and find a
way to break the curse!<yesno><close>

323291.「その答えを 待ってました！\n アストルティアと ゼニアスのために\n ネーし:
I was waiting for that answer! Together with
Zenny, let's do our best to save Astoltia
and Zeniath!
